== word ==
=== 解除安全模式 ===
为宣总解决的问题

在C:\Users\[username]\Application\Microsoft\Template\Normal.dot

删除此文件即可.

== powerpoint ==
=== 2007 version ===
==== How to cancel capitalize first letter of sentences ====
File -> Options -> Proofing -> Auto Corrent Options -> "cacel as your need"

== outlook ==
=== 2007 version ===
==== How to change theme ====
Tools -> Options -> Mail Format -> Editor Options -> colorscheme
